# Real-time chat for activity/teacher communication (socket.io)

**Description**

Add a socket-based chat module to allow teachers/parents/students to message in real time. Persist messages for offline delivery. Implement basic online-user presence.

**Acceptance criteria**

- Users can join a socket room and exchange messages.
- Messages are persisted and re-delivered when the recipient connects.

**Labels:** enhancement, realtime
**Priority:** low
